Replace.Text: War? Are you a fool? Your cities will suffer the fate of Epirus and Saguntum.
I regret that we must now go to war with each other—but I regret it only a little.

Sweden will chastise those who threaten the world. Prepare yourself for war.
Look at the big civ leader over there with the war declaration! Great job, mate. Really shows off how hard you are.
As we can reach no peaceful resolution with you Canada must turn, with reluctance, to war.
Enough! My forbearance ends here! We must have war between us, instead of a false peace.
Surely you had to know that one day there would be war between us.
Now is the time for war. Hear the stamp of our warriors—warriors with the hearts of the puma.
Good. The world shall witness the incontestable might of my armies and the glory of the Empire.
Now we have war between us. Look to the seas—already the horizon is crowded with the sails of my fleets.
I see weak lands, led by a weak ruler. You see my armies massing to overthrow you.

Sweden will do her part to push back the evils of the world. Art is one way to do this—war with you is another.
You choose death! Your people wail and moan! The pillars of your houses shake, all your lands are shaking!
As an unstinting malignancy defines your relationship to Canada, we have no recourse than war.
Your transgressions are as deep as oceans. O God, grant that I may chastise this one!
Your insolence has provoked this war, and I shall be happy to lead the Black Army to victory over you.
Let there be war between us! I will wrestle your lands away, and rule your subjects with strength.
Your continued insolence and failure to recognize my preeminence leads us to war.
